definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: I think animals can sense disaster.They have a sixth sense.
sentences.chinese: 我想动物通常能感知大灾难的来临，它们有第六感。

sentences.english: Disasters are also increasing in scale and frequency.
sentences.chinese: 大灾难的规模和频率也在不断扩大。

sentences.english: He is teetering on the edge of catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 他在大灾难的边缘徘徊。

sentences.english: Pomeranian was one of only three dogs known to have survived the disaster.
sentences.chinese: 在这次大灾难中，博美犬是三条幸存的小狗之一。

sentences.english: There will be great distress in the land and wrath against this people.
sentences.chinese: 因为将有大灾难降在这地方，也有震怒临到这百姓。

sentences.english: The telephone rings and this marks the prelude to an unforseen series of catastrophes .
sentences.chinese: 这标志着拉开了一连串意想不到的大灾难序幕。
这是关于一场大灾难的故事。

sentences.english: Thus the telling murals of catastrophe and martial law.
sentences.chinese: 所以，其壁画描写了大灾劫和军事解严。

sentences.english: The typhoon Nali was a big disaster.
You know from catastrophe, cata is Greek for down.
sentences.chinese: 从大灾难这个词知道，希腊人用cata表示下降。

sentences.english: You say that you detect in my writing a yearning for apocalypse.
sentences.chinese: 你说你在我的文章里发现一种对大灾难的渴望。

sentences.english: Good harvest was achieved in grain output in spite of serious disasters.
sentences.chinese: 粮食生产在大灾之年获得好收成。

sentences.english: The fortune teller said she sees a catastrophe in the near future that will end the human race.
sentences.chinese: 算命师说她预测近期会有一个终结全人类的大灾难。

sentences.english: Despite these major calamities, harvests were generally good.
sentences.chinese: 大灾之年，农业仍然获得了好收成。

sentences.english: His outlook may have been shaped by his own experience with catastrophe and risk.
sentences.chinese: 他的想法也许来自于他自己所经历过的大灾大难。

sentences.english: The military has a habit of speeding up technology projects after such catastrophes.
sentences.chinese: 军方有一个在这类大灾难后加快技术速度的习惯。

definition: insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
